column15: In what country is your proposed reforestation project?
Is your project a Terrestrial Project or Mangrove Project?

column7:
Native Forest
Monoculture
Sustainable Timber
Other Timber
Mangroves
Agroforestry
Silvopasture
Other Land-Use Model

column3: Native biodiverse forest planted or regenerated towards the goal of restoring something closer to the original natural forest.
column15: How many hectares do you plan to use for Native Forest?

column1: Planting Density: Native Forest (trees per ha)
column15: What is your target tree planting density for Native Forest? (trees per hectare)

column3: Stands of any one species (native or not) planted with the goal of providing a commodity or service (e.g. wood, fruit, carbon credits, soil retention, shade). Note that projects planning to use more than 10% of their reforestable area for "Monoculture" are not eligible for the Accelerator.
column15: How many hectares do you plan to use for Monoculture?
What is your target tree planting density for Monoculture? (trees per hectare)

column3: Stands of native trees planted or regenerated for potential use as timber after 30 years or more. Note that areas to be harvested for timber in less than 30 years should be counted under the "Other Timber" category. Note that projects planning to use more than 10% of their reforestable area for "Sustainable Timber" are not eligible for the Accelerator.
column15: How many hectares do you plan to use for Sustainable Timber?

column1: Planting Density: Sustainable Timber (trees per ha)
column15: What is your target tree planting density for Sustainable Timber? (trees per hectare)

column3: Any stands planted or regenerated for eventual use as timber that will be harvested in less than 30 years. Note that projects planning to use more than 10% of their reforestable area for "Other TImber" are not eligible for the Accelerator.
column15: How many hectares do you plan to use for Other Timber?

column1: Planting Density: Other Timber (trees per ha)
column15: What is your target tree planting density for Other Timber? (trees per hectare)

column3: Planted or regenerated forest dominated by mangrove species.
column15: How many hectares do you plan to use for Mangroves?
What is your target tree planting density for Mangroves? (trees per hectare)

column3: Planted or regenerated forest supplemented with plantings primarily to produce agricultural crops and other non-timber forest products (e.g. medicinal plants, honey, etc.).
column15: How many hectares do you plan to use for Agroforestry?
What is your target tree planting density for Agroforestry? (trees per hectare)

column3: Sparse planted or regenerated forests that serve as pasture for domestic animals (e.g. cattle, goats, sheep, etc.).
column15: How many hectares do you plan to use for Silvopasture?
What is your target tree planting density for Silvopasture? (trees per hectare)

column1: Land Use Model: Other Land-Use Model (ha)
column15: How many hectares do you plan to use for other land-use models?

column1: Planting Density: Other Land-Use Model (trees per ha)
column15: What is your target tree planting density for other land-use models? (trees per hectare)
Please provide more information on what other land-use models you plan to use.

column1: Number of Species To Be Planted
column3: Native species are those that exist in the project area naturally as opposed to having been brought there at some point by humans. Note that project's must plant at least 10 native tree species in terrestrial forests, or at least 3 in mangrove forests, to be considered eligible for the Accelerator.
column15: How many native tree species do you intend to use in your restoration?
If this project is successful, is there potential to expand your reforestation efforts to other nearby land parcels?
If so, how much more land could be added? (ha)
